title: Recycling Center Simulator
description:
Use the computer to bargain with people in the city who sell their waste to buy products cheap. Collect Waste From The Places You Buy Collect the wastes, to gather raw matterials. Wizard of Legend 2
Sort Raw Materials for Recycling Bring the harvested wastes to your factory and sort them by type in the sorting machine Put Raw Material Back into Production to Make More Valuable Products Sell New and More Valuable Products and Expand Your Factory

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i7-6700k or AMD Ryzen 3 1200X
